input_text:
Job Title: Account Executive, Corporate Compliance & Services

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About Us: EntityKeeper is a leading provider of corporate services and entity management software solutions. With a strong commitment to innovation and client satisfaction, we help organizations streamline their corporate governance, compliance, and legal entity management processes. Our cutting-edge software empowers businesses to stay compliant, reduce risk, and drive operational efficiency.  EntityKeeper falls under the Thirty Capital umbrella. Thirty Capital is a mid-market CRE investment & advisory firm dedicated to protecting cashflow, generating equity returns, and creating alpha from commercial real estate assets. Job Summary: We are seeking a Sales Professional to join our dynamic team and drive sales of our corporate services and entity management software. The successful candidate will leverage their extensive experience in B2B sales to identify and cultivate new business opportunities, manage client relationships, and achieve revenue targets. We are seeking professionals with experience selling services with a focus on those with experience selling to commercial real estate and private equity offices. If you have a proven track record of selling services or software solutions to corporate clients and excel at consultative selling, we want to hear from you!  Key Responsibilities: 1. Business Development: Identify and target corporate clients in need of entity management and corporate services solutions. Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to generate new business leads and opportunities. Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline. 2. Consultative Selling: Understand clients' unique needs, pain points, and goals to provide corporate services and entity management solutions. Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the value of our comprehensive solution which includes corporate services with software serving as the backbone. Collaborate with the product development team to incorporate client feedback into product enhancements. 3. Relationship Management: Establish and nurture strong, long-term relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders. Act as a trusted advisor, providing insights and solutions to address clients' challenges. Ensure a high level of client satisfaction and retention. 4. Sales Performance: Achieve and exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets. Prepare and submit accurate sales forecasts and reports to management. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitors to maintain a competitive edge. 5. Team Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, customer support, and product development, to drive sales success. Share market insights and customer feedback to improve our software and service offerings.  Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (MBA preferred). Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in B2B sales, preferably selling software solutions to corporate clients. Proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets. Strong understanding of corporate governance, compliance, and entity management. Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficiency in CRM software and sales tracking tools.  Benefits: Competitive base salary and commission structure. Comprehensive health, dental, and retirement benefits. Ongoing training and professional development opportunities. A supportive and collaborative work environment. Opportunity for career advancement within a growing company.  If you are a results-driven sales professional with a passion for helping corporate clients optimize their entity management processes, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join EntityKeeper and be a part of a team dedicated to driving innovation and excellence in corporate services and entity management software solutions.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Account Executive, Corporate Compliance & Services
output_json.summary: Join EntityKeeper, a leading provider of corporate services and entity management software solutions, as a Sales Professional to drive sales of our services and software.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
job_responsibilities: Develop and execute a strategic sales plan
Build and maintain a sales pipeline
Understand clients' needs and provide solutions
Prepare and submit sales forecasts and reports
Stay updated with industry trends and competitors
benefits: Competitive base salary and commission structure
Comprehensive health, dental, and retirement benefits
Ongoing training and professional development opportunities
A supportive and collaborative work environment
output_json.company_information: EntityKeeper is a leading provider of corporate services and entity management software solutions. Thirty Capital is a mid-market CRE investment & advisory firm.
